Title: Trapdoor
Plot: Crews's father, Charles Crews, Sr., shows up at his son's doorstep to try to mend fences. Crews and Reese investigate the death of three Russians;  Reese falls into old habits.
GuestStars: Geoffrey Pierson, Tessa Thompson, Garret Dillahunt, Jon Sklaroff, Ondrej Habinak, Aria Pullman, Ed Corbin, Kevin Indio Copeland, David Ury, Edin Gali
